Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory162.png'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'Huaxu, did you bring them here?', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryFunction.prefab', 2: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'As if held up by some invisible force, Lucia quietly floats in the air.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryFunction.prefab'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'Lucia, come this way!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Qu', 3: 'Huaxu, a real you, one with flesh and soul, will soon be born.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: "So it's you who's been controlling the ship?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: "But... aren't you the one who took us in?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'Pulao, the only reason I took you all in is to cultivate a suitable vessel. But eventually I realized that none of you... are fit for purpose.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'Constructs are the intermediate of humans and machines. Half human, half machine. A perfect hybrid, the perfect hotbed.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'The moment I laid my eyes upon Lucia, I knew she was the one I had been seeking.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'A pure mind begets an immaculate body, and vise versa. The mind and body wax and wane together. And Lucia is a supreme example of such a synergy.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'With Lucia as the vessel, Huaxu will become the perfect existence.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "This is the true freedom you've been seeking, Huaxu!", 4: '1'}
{1: 'RImgBg1Shake'}
{3: 'Qu shouts at the void, her manner frantic.'}
{3: 'No one can bring themselves to speak because of the tension in the air. And yet, Huaxu is still answering in silence.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Qu', 3: 'Huaxu, I know you can hear me!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Huaxu', 3: 'I can hear you... so please let them go.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Huaxu', 3: 'Please leave this ship alone.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Qu', 3: "Huaxu, why do you have to fight me on this? Didn't you say you wanted to walk the earth and see the world?!", 4: '1'}

{2: 'Qu', 3: "Most machines are too weak to accommodate you, and the other Constructs fail to match your beauty. You are perfection itself. That's why I set up the trade fair and spent night after night, looking for a vessel for you.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'You are my proudest creation, the embodiment of beauty and freedom. Humans are foolish, life-seeking. Machines are clumsy, soulless.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'The Punishing Virus will eat and filter through the entire world, and only you, only you will be fit to live...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Huaxu', 3: "That's enough... Villier.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "You shouldn't have disobeyed me, Huaxu.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Qu brandishes and points a spear at you.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Qu', 3: 'We\'re almost there, Huaxu. Destroy them. And put your "mind" in that girl\'s body.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: '—I command you.', 4: '1'}
{2: "I won't let you do this.", 3: '51', 4: "Lucia will not become Huaxu's vessel.", 5: '51'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'You think you can stop me? You?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Pulao', 3: 'And me too... If Lady Qu is the one causing all this pain and suffering...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Qu', 3: 'I will give you freedom, Huaxu.', 4: '1'}
